message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $120 for it, but I'm open to negotiating.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  $90 is a little low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $105?  I'm confident you'll find the product worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for it.
